long_description: Protect your vehicle's finish (and the boat's keel) with the Thule Water Slide protective pad when loading and unloading boats. Water Slide mat has a slippery top surface so boats slide on and off; underside of mat features a nonskid surface that stays put without sticking to car finish. Integrated straps attach pad to load bars. Dimensions: 36 x 24 x 0.125 in.
short_description: Protect your vehicle's finish (and the boat's keel) with the Thule Water Slide protective pad when loading and unloading boats.
